actions.text: Referred to House Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: A bill to extend the time, from one to six years, during which a person may bring court action with respect to bonds required, under the act commonly known as the Miller Act, in connection with the construction, alteration, and repair of any public building or public work of the United States.

summary.text: Extends the time, from one to six years, during which a person may bring court action with respect to bonds required under the Miller Act in connection with the construction, alteration, and repair of any public building or public work of the United States.

titles.title: A bill to extend the time, from one to six years, during which a person may bring court action with respect to bonds required, under the act commonly known as the Miller Act, in connection with the construction, alteration, and repair of any public building or public work of the United States.
